body:
Hey Everyone
I would like your opinions on what I should record on Avicus. What I mean by this is:
- Challenge Video
- Recording /w The Community
& other stuff like that

Leave your Opinions and Ideas below!

title: Avicus Video Ideas

replies.body: Recording with the Community. It would be cool to see you play with other players.
replies.body_tagged: Recording with the Community. It would be cool to see you play with other players.

replies.body: Bumping this topic... For more ideas
replies.body_tagged: Bumping this topic... For more ideas

replies.body: Funny moments are my favorite - I'd rather watch youtubers enjoy the game they are playing ;3

replies.body:

Also do what Blaze said.
